unnormalised: ## Flash Sales: Grab it Before it's Gone, Yaar!
normalised: ## Flash Sales: Grab it Before it's Gone, Yaar!

unnormalised: Okay, let's talk flash sales. We've all seen them, right? That frantic email screaming "70% OFF! Limited Time Only!" from Myntra or Ajio. Or that blinking banner on Flipkart promising unbelievable deals for the next 2 hours. It's enough to make even the most chilled-out shopper like Rahul in Bangalore feel the FOMO (Fear Of Missing Out).
normalised: Okay, let's talk flash sales. We've all seen them, right? That frantic email screaming "seventy percent OFF! Limited Time Only!" from Myntra or Ajio. Or that blinking banner on Flipkart promising unbelievable deals for the next two hours. It's enough to make even the most chilled-out shopper like Rahul in Bangalore feel the F O M O (Fear Of Missing Out).

unnormalised: So, what *exactly* is a flash sale? Basically, it's a sale that lasts for a very short time – think hours, maybe a day at most. The discounts are usually pretty steep, and the stock is often limited. Retailers love them because they create a sense of urgency and can clear out old inventory fast. Think of it as a quick jhatka to boost sales!

unnormalised: For us shoppers, especially with festivals like Diwali coming up, flash sales can be a goldmine. You can snag that fancy new phone you've been eyeing or finally afford that silk saree your mom, Mrs. Sharma, has always wanted. But be warned, my friends! Don't get carried away! The pressure to buy quickly can lead to impulse purchases you later regret.

unnormalised: Before diving into that 90% off flash sale on ethnic wear, take a deep breath. Ask yourself: Do I really need this? Can I afford it? Is the quality decent? Remember that amazing "designer" bag you bought for Rs. 500 last year? Yeah, the one that fell apart after 2 weeks.

unnormalised: Here's a quick tip from your friendly neighborhood aunty: Check the seller's reviews before clicking 'buy'. Also, compare prices on other websites to make sure you're actually getting a good deal. Don't be fooled by clever marketing!

unnormalised: So, next time you see a flash sale pop up, channel your inner Chanakya and strategize! Happy shopping, and may the best deals be yours!
